definition: Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Angleton briefed me on the contents of the finished report.
sentences.chinese: 安格尔顿向我简单介绍了调查报告的内容。

sentences.english: A painting of Ingres was suspended on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 一幅安格尔的绘画挂在墙上。

sentences.english: Ingres had made a fatal mistake.
sentences.chinese: 安格尔曾经犯了一个致命的错误。

sentences.english: I learnt in the Menai Straits off Anglesey at 19. It's an escape from thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我19岁的时候在梅奈海峡的安格尔西岛学会帆板。
